long_description: The Bison Designs T-Lock Money belt helps you conceal cash and a few small valuables while traveling. Full-length zipper on the backside of the belt gives you a place to stash money and small valuables. Nylon webbing with plastic buckle won't set off the metal detector at airport checkpoints. Size medium fits up to 38 in. waists; size large fits up to 42 in. waists.
short_description: The Bison Designs T-Lock Money belt helps you conceal cash and a few small valuables while traveling.
